here has been with me through South

with this passport right here it is time

because you can't stamp your book so
that's actually a real thing make sure
you have pages available when you're

left
other than electives so the courses that

this was actually a very difficult stamp
to get it was not one of those that you
can just stamp upon entry I actually had
to wake up super early one morning in
Bangkok me and my friends there was
three of us all guys we went and got in
a taxi went to the Myanmar immigration
office and we had to stand in line I
think from like 6 a.m. to 7 a.m. to make
sure that we were one of the first
because we had school later that day I
think we spent about 2 hours in total
and then two days later we had to come
and collect it so certain stamps were
harder to get but I think that for all

100% worth it it was one of those trips
where it really put me through the
challenge as a traveler I remember it
was the first time I ever experienced

we ripped around this little village I

I was probably eating around the 5 to 8

entire day with probably 30 to 50 pounds
on her back with this huge backpack a

to the very top we made it and we slept
at the top in this treehouse we watched

as well as rappelling down a waterfall
so these are the really cool things you

path we took the word of another

would have never heard of that or done
that otherwise so I guess one of my
biggest takeaways from that moment that
I kind of applied to all my future

you get from another traveler sometimes
the best advice will not be found online
it's found from those other travelers
who have experienced things the day

but hey I got nothing else planned and

how successful we were in doing that I

travel
with a purpose it brought a new meaning

definitely recommend that if you're

traveling through beaches for eight

it's just a law of decreasing marginal
returns every time you take a bite out

less than the first it's the same thing
with travel by the third month by the
seven month your enjoyment is less but
if you can find ways to kind of switch

you're doing some work during your
